strapiPost.title: Live in America Festival Starting Tommorrow
strapiPost.content:
The Live in America Festival celebrating eight communities across the US and Mexico is beginning this week in partnership with The Momentary.

  • Celebrating culture: The festival is meant to observe the cultures and traditions of different communities across America. These differences are what make the world we live in so great, and are definitely something to celebrate.
  • Eight communities, two weeks: From Jun 2 - 12, you'll be able to see shows, installations, and listen to talks highlighting the featured communities. These events will take place across downtown Bentonville.

Learn more about the festival or go ahead and reserve your tickets here.
